relocation.message: ${project.groupId}:${project.artifactId}:${project.version} was relocated to io.quarkus:quarkus-resteasy-client:${project.version}. Please update the artifactId of the dependency in your project configuration. For more information about this change, please refer to https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/wiki/Migration-Guide-3.7#rest-client
